extension.name: System - Widgetkit Virtuemart
extension.author: $Author$
extension.description:
Widgetkit plugin for Virtuemart

Pulls together Virtuemart and Widgetkit displaying Virtuemart products with Widgetkit anywhere on your site. Inspired by widgetkit_joomla plugin developed by YOOtheme and mod_virtuemart_product developed by The VirtueMart Development Team.

Requirements:

  • The Virtuemart product module must be installed but not necessarily activated
  • widgetkit - either lite or full version installed and widgetkits content and system plugin activated
